data.name: A Dog Dryer
data.description: The dryer makes the dog dry by drying all the hairs to avoid dripping on the floor.
data.features: It can be used to dry the dog body and remove water.

data.name: Uranium Ore
data.description: Uranium ore is very useful and its mining is done using the good technologies.
data.features: It is a radioactive element and it can be dissolved very easily.

data.name: A Realistic Dog Pillow
data.description: This is the kind of pillow to experience the feeling of having a flury dog around us.
data.features: This pillow is soft and very comfortable. It can be used as a fake dog image.

data.name: 30 Pieces of Fake Garlic
data.description: This is a decorating material to decorate the stuff or food.
data.features: It looks good and there is no need to buy and use original garlics.

data.name: A pizza hat
data.description: Pizza hat is like wearing the pizz on the head and its good for people who love pizza.
data.features: It is a hat and people can enjoy wearing it. It is a kind of fun.
